generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone street with tram tracks running down its center, which is a type of road.
- sidewalk: There are paved areas on both sides of the road where pedestrians are walking, which are designated sidewalks.
- building: There are several buildings visible, including a yellow building on the left with signage and a large modern building with glass windows in the background.
- wall: A low stone wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk.
- fence: A black metal fence is visible along the right side of the image, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: There are several poles visible, including one with a traffic sign and streetlights.
- traffic sign: A circular "20" speed limit sign is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible in the image, including one large tree on the right side and smaller bushes near the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk, including a woman in a floral shirt on the left and a group of people further down the street.
- car: A small portion of a yellow car is visible parked behind the building on the left side of the image.
